謓字的基本解释

謓
chēn
古同“嗔”，怒。

謓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tián］
［《廣韻》徒年切，平先，定。］
盛貌。参见“嗔嗔”、“嗔咽”。
[②]［chēn］
［《廣韻》昌真切，平真，昌。］
亦作“謓1”。
(1)发怒；生气。
(2)责怪；埋怨。
(3)难怪，怪不得。
(4)用同“瞋”。不满地睁大眼睛注视。
(5)河豚的别名。

謓字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謓； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第08
【唐韻】昌眞切【集韻】稱人切，?音瞋。【說文】恚也。【廣雅】怒也。【廣韻】與嗔、瞋同。【集韻】或作㥲。　又【集韻】【類篇】?之刃切，音震。笑也。【說文】賈侍中說。

謓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謓字的起名意思

暂无。

謓
Basic explanation of words
謓
chēn
Gu Tong "ang" and angry.
謓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tián］
["Guangyun" cuts in the last few years, flat first, set. ]
Grand appearance. See also "angling", "angling".
[②] [chēn]
["Guangyun" Changzheng, Pingzhen, Chang. ]
Also known as "謓1".
(1) Get angry; get angry.
(2) Blame; complain.
(3) No wonder, no wonder.
(4) Use the same as "suffocation". Open your eyes dissatisfiedly and stare.
(5) The alias of pufferfish.
謓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謓; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1175 Page 08
【Tang Yun】Chang Yuqie 【Jiyun】It is said to be cut, and the sound is terrible. [Said Wen] Yun Ye. [Guang Ya] Anger too. [Guang Yun] Same with anger and hatred. 【Ji Yun】or as 㥲.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? The cutting edge, the sound is shaking. Laugh too. [Said Wen] Jia Shizhong said.
謓
